tool_description: Manages disk partitions for OS installation including creating, deleting, resizing, and formatting partitions with proper alignment and file system selection.

target_disk.description: Target disk identifier for partition operations

partitions.description: List of partition configurations with size, type, and file system

preserve_data.description: Whether to preserve existing data where possible

alignment_optimized.description: Whether to optimize partition alignment for SSDs

format_partitions.description: Whether to format partitions after creation

error_messages: Target disk not found: Specified disk identifier does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid partition scheme: Use either GPT or MBR partition scheme.
Insufficient disk space: Requested partitions exceed available disk space.
Partition configuration error: Invalid partition size, type, or file system specification.
Data preservation failed: Unable to preserve existing data during partition operations.
Partition alignment failed: Unable to optimize partition alignment for the storage device.
Format operation failed: Unable to format one or more partitions with specified file system.
usage: Specify target_disk and partition_scheme (GPT for UEFI systems, MBR for Legacy). Define partitions array with size and file system for each partition. Enable preserve_data only for non-destructive operations.

total_allocated_space_gb.description: Total disk space allocated to partitions in gigabytes

remaining_free_space_gb.description: Remaining unallocated disk space in gigabytes

partition_layout.description: Final partition layout with sizes and file systems

operation_successful.description: Whether all partition operations completed successfully
